name: Deathchanter

auras.raw_description: Increases Ally DEF in the Arena by 27%.

skills.name: Clobber
skills.raw_description:
Attacks 1 enemy. Places a [Shield] buff on this Champion for 2 turns. The value of the [Shield] is equal to 20% of the damage inflicted.
Damage based on: [ATK]
Lvl. 2 Damage +5%
Lvl. 3 Damage +5%
Lvl. 4 Damage +5%
Lvl. 5 Damage +5%
Lvl. 6 Damage +10%

skills.name: Bully
skills.raw_description:
Attacks 1 enemy. Damage increases according to this Champion's current HP.
Damage based on: [ATK]
Lvl. 2 Damage +5%
Lvl. 3 Damage +5%
Lvl. 4 Damage +5%
Lvl. 5 Damage +10%
Lvl. 6 Damage +10%
Lvl. 7 Cooldown -1

skills.name: Bleed Out
skills.raw_description:
Attacks 1 enemy. Places a 100% [Heal Reduction] debuff for 3 turns.
Damage based on: [ATK]
Lvl. 2 Damage +5%
Lvl. 3 Damage +5%
Lvl. 4 Damage +5%
Lvl. 5 Damage +10%
Lvl. 6 Cooldown -1
Lvl. 7 Cooldown -1
